thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 25 of 227
thread.title: Deborah, Taylor, MI
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Deborah, Taylor, MI

author: Deborah, Taylor, MI
title: Deborah, Taylor, MI
text:
I went into the store not knowing what type of mattress I would be interested in. The sales person was very knowledgeable and a very big help. I would see him again for any additional future purchase. He was very helpful from beginning to end of the sale.
Then, I least expected to be able to have the delivery on the same day. The two men delivered my mattresses with professionalism and efficiency.
I was able to experience a very good night sleep. I am very pleased with the choice and purchase. This was a top notch experience. I appreciate everything. Thank you, Gardner White!
